description.zh-cn: 中国企业家，李长春之子，曾任中国移动副总经理。
description.en: Chinese entrepreneur, son of Li Changchun, former Deputy General Manager of China Mobile.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共中央政治局常委。
description.en: Chinese politician, former member of the Politburo Standing Committee of the CCP.

en: Politburo Standing Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高领导机构。
description.en: The highest leadership body of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国的一家电信公司。
description.en: A telecommunications company in China.

en: Time Division Synchronous Code Division Multiple Access

description.zh-cn: 一种3G移动通信标准。
description.en: A 3G mobile telecommunications standard.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国哈尔滨市的一所大学。
description.en: A university located in Harbin, China.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国纽约市的一所私立研究型大学。
description.en: A private research university located in New York City, United States.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国香港的一所公立研究型大学。
description.en: A public research university located in Hong Kong, China.

description.zh-cn: 联想集团旗下的手机业务部门。
description.en: The mobile phone business unit of Lenovo Group.

description.zh-cn: 一家全球性的电信基础设施供应商。
description.en: A global telecommunications infrastructure provider.

en: Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的一所大学。
description.en: A university located in Beijing, China.

description.zh-cn: 中国辽宁省下辖的副省级市。
description.en: A sub-provincial city under the jurisdiction of Liaoning Province, China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国党和国家领导人的子女

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国党和国家领导人的子女

description.zh-cn: 对中华人民共和国党和国家领导人子女的泛称。
description.en: A general term for the children of party and state leaders of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国移动通信集团有限公司的高级管理职位。
description.en: A senior management position at China Mobile Communications Group Co., Ltd.

description.zh-cn: 在北京邮电大学任教的人员群体。
description.en: The group of personnel teaching at Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications.

description.zh-cn: 李慧镝是李长春的儿子。
description.en: Li Huidi is the son of Li Changchun.

description.zh-cn: 李长春是中共中央政治局常委。
description.en: Li Changchun was a member of the Politburo Standing Committee of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 李慧镝籍贯辽宁省大连市。
description.en: Li Huidi's ancestral home is Dalian, Liaoning Province.

description.zh-cn: 1990年获得哈尔滨工业大学无线电系电子工程专业学士学位。
description.en: Graduated from Harbin Institute of Technology in 1990 with a bachelor's degree in Electronic Engineering from the Department of Radio Engineering.

description.zh-cn: 1996年获得美国纽约大学理工学院电气工程硕士学位。
description.en: Received a Master's degree in Electrical Engineering from the Tandon School of Engineering at New York University in 1996.

description.zh-cn: 2008年获得香港理工大学管理学博士学位。
description.en: Received a Doctor of Management degree from The Hong Kong Polytechnic University in 2008.

description.zh-cn: 李慧镝曾任联想手机的副总裁。
description.en: Li Huidi previously served as the Vice President of Lenovo Mobile.

description.zh-cn: 李慧镝曾任UT斯达康的副总裁。
description.en: Li Huidi previously served as the Vice President of UTStarcom.

description.zh-cn: 2008年7月，李慧镝调任中国移动集团公司总裁助理。
description.en: In July 2008, Li Huidi was transferred to China Mobile Communications Corporation as Assistant President.

description.zh-cn: 2010年1月，李慧镝升任中国移动副总裁，负责TD-SCDMA相关业务。
description.en: In January 2010, Li Huidi was promoted to Vice President of China Mobile, responsible for TD-SCDMA related business.

description.zh-cn: 2012年2月22日，李慧镝任职中国移动集团公司副总经理。
description.en: On February 22, 2012, Li Huidi was appointed Deputy General Manager of China Mobile Communications Corporation.

description.zh-cn: 在担任中国移动副总裁期间，李慧镝负责TD-SCDMA相关业务。
description.en: While serving as Vice President of China Mobile, Li Huidi was responsible for business related to TD-SCDMA.

description.zh-cn: 2010年7月2日，李慧镝成为北京邮电大学的兼职教授。
description.en: On July 2, 2010, Li Huidi became an adjunct professor at Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国党和国家领导人的子女

description.zh-cn: 根据页面分类，李慧镝是中华人民共和国党和国家领导人的子女之一。
description.en: According to the page category, Li Huidi is one of the children of party and state leaders of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 根据页面分类，李慧镝是中国移动副总经理之一。
description.en: According to the page category, Li Huidi is a Deputy General Manager of China Mobile.

description.zh-cn: 根据页面分类，李慧镝是北京邮电大学教师之一。
description.en: According to the page category, Li Huidi is a teacher at Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications.
